attributes.action: Consider the election of Sarah Reinhold to the position of deputy Prime Minisiter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sarah Reinhold is widely recognised as having fantastic, if not super human powers. Put in a position of authority Miss Reinhold would surely right all wrongs, silence all doubt and probably legalise marijuana.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
